title: GMFB: So many cheesesteaks
itunes:title: GMFB: So many cheesesteaks
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: Nate gets approached by the paparazzi in New York City (:29); Kay and Nate discuss working the NFL Draft Red Carpet (2:45); The group shares their favorite moments in Philly: Kyle on taste-testing cheese steaks (5:49), Peter on the unpredictability of this year’s Draft (11:36), Kay on Philly raising the bar for an NFL Draft experience (14:25) and how impressed Nate was with the draft coverage (15:24); Peter talks using his info to provide insight on Draft night (17:09) and how QBs always find a way into prominence (20:56); The team on watching Peter’s Draft-night work (24:58); The team talks Christian McCaffrey going to the Panthers (26:54) and the resurgence of the NFC South (31:35); How GM John Lynch’s fared in his first draft (33:16); Kyle talks National Star Wars Day and Peter having never seen the movies (36:12); The team talks about prepping for the Sports Emmys (39:36); and finally, Kay recounts Nate’s positive interactions with the fans in Philly (43:10)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
